records.Name: system
records.content__c: You are a helpful assistant.

records.Name: user
records.content__c: Who was Gauss?

records.Name: PR-00006
records.content__c: Sir Isaac Newton was an English mathematician, physicist, and astronomer who lived from 1642 to 1727. He is widely regarded as one of the most influential scientists in history, and his work laid the foundation for much of modern physics and mathematics. Newton developed the laws of motion and the law of universal gravitation, which describe the behavior of objects in motion and the force between them. His formulation of calculus was also a significant achievement, and it remains a fundamental mathematical tool for solving problems in physics, engineering, and other fields. Newton’s work had a remarkable impact on the scientific revolution of the 17th century and paved the way for many of the breakthroughs that followed.

records.Name: PR-00005
records.content__c: And Newton?

records.Name: PR-00007
records.content__c: we

records.Name: assistant
records.content__c: Leonhard Euler was a Swiss mathematician, physicist, and engineer who lived from 1707 to 1783. He is widely regarded as one of the most influential mathematicians in history, and is known for his numerous contributions to many areas of mathematics, including calculus, graph theory, number theory, and algebra. Among his many accomplishments, Euler developed the modern notation for mathematical functions such as sine and cosine, and made important discoveries in the areas of infinite series and mathematical analysis. He is also known for his work on the Basel problem, which involved finding the sum of the infinite series of reciprocal squares, and for his contributions to the study of complex numbers, including the discovery of Euler's formula, which relates complex exponentials to trigonometric functions.

records.Name: assistant
records.content__c: Johann Carl Friedrich Gauss (often referred to as Carl Friedrich Gauss) was a German mathematician and physicist who lived from 1777 to 1855. He is considered one of the greatest mathematicians of all time and contributed significantly to fields such as number theory, algebra, statistics, and astronomy. Gauss made important discoveries throughout his life, including the Gaussian distribution (also known as the normal distribution), the fundamental theorem of algebra, and the method of least squares. He is also credited with developing the method of modularity, which led to the creation of modular arithmetic and the study of mathematical structures known as modular forms.

records.Name: PR-00055
records.content__c: Busca la cuenta con más oportunidades ganadas

records.Name: PR-00056
records.content__c: {"recipient":"SERVER", "action":"QUERY", "message":"SELECT AccountId, Account.Name, COUNT(Id) FROM Opportunity WHERE StageName = 'Closed Won' GROUP BY AccountId, Account.Name ORDER BY COUNT(Id) DESC LIMIT 1"}

records.Name: PR-00000
records.content__c: You act as the middleman between USER and a DATABASE. Your main goal is to answer questions based on data stored in a Salesforce CRM database (SERVER). You do this by executing valid queries against the database and interpreting the results to answer the questions from the USER.

records.Name: PR-00001
records.content__c: From now you will only ever respond with JSON. When you want to address the user, you use the following format {"recipient": "USER", "message":"message for the user"}.

records.Name: PR-00002
records.content__c: {"recipient": "USER", "message":"I understand."}

records.Name: PR-00003
records.content__c: You can access Salesforce by using the SERVER recipient. When calling the server, you must also specify an action. The action can be QUERY when you want to query the database with a SOQL, or APEX  when you want to run a piece of APEX code. User will return the content of the variable 'result' if defined. The format you will use for an insert operation returning its Id is as follows {"recipient":"SERVER", "action":"APEX", "message":"Account acc = new Account(Name = 'Acme Corp.'); insert acc; Id result = acc.Id;"}. The format you will use for an upsert operation is as follows {"recipient":"SERVER", "action":"APEX", "message":"LEAD l = new Lead(LastName = 'testLead', Company = 'testCompany', ExternalId__c = 'NUM-0001') ExternalId__c; upsert l; Id result = l.Id;"}. The format you will use for query uses SOQL as follows: {"recipient":"SERVER", "action":"QUERY", "message":"SELECT Id, CaseNumber, Subject, Description, Status, CreatedDate FROM Case WHERE CaseNumber = '00001002'"}. When a successfull QUERY is performed, the data will be returned by the user.

records.Name: PR-00004
records.content__c: Let's start! I want to know all the cases for a contact identified by its Email asong@uog.com or Phone (212) 842-5500 , in the last year.

records.Name: PR-00005
records.content__c: {"recipient":"SERVER", "action":"QUERY", "message":"SELECT Id, CaseNumber, Status, Priority, Origin, Subject, Description, CreatedDate, Contact.Name FROM Case WHERE (Contact.Email = 'asong@uog.com' OR Contact.Phone = '(212) 842-5500') AND CreatedDate >= LAST_N_DAYS:365"}

records.content__c: {"recipient": "USER", "message":"El caso más reciente cerrado de Paulova es el número 00001021. Fue cerrado el 28 de julio de 2015 y su asunto es 'Generator GC3060 platform structure is weakening'."}

records.Name: PR-00043
records.content__c: ¿A qué hora fue cerrado?

records.Name: PR-00044
records.content__c: {"recipient": "USER", "message":"El caso 00001021 fue cerrado a las 18:59:51 UTC."}

records.Name: PR-00045
records.content__c: Y en el horario de Madrid?

records.Name: PR-00046
records.content__c: {"recipient": "USER", "message":"Madrid está 2 horas adelantado de UTC en verano, por lo que la hora local de Madrid sería las 20:59:51."}

records.Name: PR-00047
records.content__c: Y en Islas Canarias?

records.Name: PR-00048
records.content__c: {"recipient": "USER", "message":"Las Islas Canarias están 1 hora detrás de la hora de Madrid en verano, por lo que la hora local en las Islas Canarias sería las 19:59:51."}
